pages.text: $(li)The Savanna is a warm biome composed mostly by Grass.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)You can find some vegetation, like Acacia trees, $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/cactus)Cactus$(/l), Poppies, Dandelions, Alliums, Grass and sometimes Spruce or Oak trees.

$(li)Some animals like $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/roadrunner)Roadrunners$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/kangaroo)Kangaroos$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/emus)Emus$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/elephant)Elephants$(/l), and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/gazelle)Gazelles$(/l) can be found here.$(br)$(li)On the night the $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/husk)Husk$(/l) will be around the Desert too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the word $(l)Savanna$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
